website_summaries.verdict: This cloth option fixes tightly to the faucet and eliminates all hard edges.
pros: Wash in the machine without hurting the product
Made from polyester to dry fast
Easiest to take on and off quickly if you plan to use it only when baby takes a bath
Soft and squishy fish head gives extra padding
Hard for a baby to remove from the faucet
cons: Does not have a hole in the top to allow you to reach the shower knob

customer_reviews.title: Finally!! Yes!
customer_reviews.text: This actually stays on the faucet unlike the hippo and whale ones from other brands. This ones doesn’t look like it from the picture but it does have padding/foam inside! It fits the faucet and has the bottom strap closer to the back of the faucet so it’s tough for a baby to pull it off. Also there is a hole in the top for the knob on top of the faucet that you cannot tell from the picture also! Get this one!!
customer_reviews.author: RB, New Jersey

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay on. Slips off.
customer_reviews.text: Does not work on a spout without a pull on it. Slips right off. You can't pull the strap tight enough to prevent it.
customer_reviews.author: Tia Spencer

customer_reviews.title: love that it is washable
customer_reviews.text: Good price point and product. Was sick of having to throw out my spout covers due to excessive black mold. Glad this one can be tossed in the dishwasher/laundry machine. Tiny bit annoying to grab the shower latch because you have to dig into the opening and also means you have to touch the cover. Another thing is this cover stays wet 24/7, so I assume it will mold very quickly - will need to throw in the wash every week or two.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy adventures

customer_reviews.title: Great for pull down shower diverters!
customer_reviews.text: I have the kind of tub that you have to pull down on the diverter from the spout part to turn the shower on. I wanted a tub bumper but all the other ones made it so I had to pull it off for the other family to use the shower. This one was perfect (with a small modification) This bumper has a round hole where the water comes out that is the perfect size to go around the spout of my tub. I just had to cut out the mesh and bada bing! Now we can leave the bumper on all the time and everyone can use the tub and shower!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle NTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: No more head bonks
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Fit no problem and has a neat little net at the bottom to allow water through. It’s made of a sturdy soft neoprene material and has a lot of cushion and padding built in to the top. We have already bonked heads with it multiple times and no injuries. Plus, since it covers the fascinating (boring) part of the faucet my baby lost interest in playing constantly with it and now actually plays with her bath toys.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Amburn

customer_reviews.title: Utterly useless.
customer_reviews.text: I dont know many babies who could fall *on top* of the bath spout, but if yours is prone to doing so, this would work great because that's the only place this spout cover has any padding. I need padding underneath, to cover the hard, sharp part of the faucet they hit their head on when they raise up. This is utterly useless for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: bookgirl1213

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far. Chose it because i dont wamt mold issues. Easy to put on and take off, it has a velcro strap. I always take it off after baths and hang to dry. Its made of the same material as water shoes. The end is full of gel and sticks out further than the faucet itself, which is good. I can feel the edge of the faucet where water comes out (the mesh part) but it doesn't seem likely my 18 month old will hit her head there because of the way this thing sticks out further than the faucet. Will update if she hits her head.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Instant Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Instant garbage. Velcro only on one side so it's not fully adjustable, won't work on a skinny faucet. Also, the neoprene is just constantly soaking wet. Would need to be washed and dried daily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Practical and cute
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had found this for my first child. I bought this after both my twins bump their heads on the tub faucet. There were other ones but this one was very cute. The material is neoprene and well cushioned. It can be installed in standard faucets the ones that you pull on the bottom to switch to the shower or the ones that you pull a rod on the top. I have the former and it works well. The twins have tried to take it off and they haven't succeeded, they love to play with it. They have bumped on it but without pain. Infantino makes great products.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Not as effective as I would have hoped
customer_reviews.text: This thing is cute and soft and I really wish it was effective, however it is not. The Velcro does not seem to work when it’s wet, which is when she is in the bath. It comes off very easy especially because the Velcro doesn’t work. I usually don’t have issues with the infantino brand but I did not find this worth my purchase as I am now going to have to find one that works.
customer_reviews.author: Venus Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It has very good padding. It's machine washable so it's easy to clean. It has a velcro strap that fastens around the spout which means it's easy to install and remove. It has a hole in the top were an adult can reach down and pull up the plug for the shower, so it's convenient. In fact it's so easy to slip on and off of the spout that we usually take it off when the kid is done bathing and let it dry between baths, which helps prevent mildew. Like I said though it's machine washable so you really don't have to worry about mildew if you're washing it regularly anyway.
customer_reviews.author: MrsH2O

customer_reviews.title: Great Tub Spout Cover
customer_reviews.text: My twin boys were constantly messing with the plunger on the tub spout when getting a bath. Not to mention the two together can rough house a good bit. This cover does a great job of preventing them from messing with the plunger and I don't have to worry if one of them knocks their head on the spout now with the padding in this cover. I was worried that the boys would just try to take it off, but they haven't even tried. It does seem fairly firmly on when I install it so it might be a bit of a challenge for them if they did try. Super cute as well.
customer_reviews.author: pony

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and neoprene!
customer_reviews.text: I got one and immediately put it on the spout. The strap ripped off. Completely off. I was sad. Then I contacted seller or Amazon and requested a replacement....got it in 2 days. Since it was replaced immediately, I am very happy. It is so cute. Holds on pretty good and is soft. My children are 5 years old so I don't have issues with them wanting to pull it off. They have hurt their back on the spouts before so that's why they don't pull them off. They know it is protecting them. So far it has dried also but it does take good 24 hours for that.
customer_reviews.author: ElizTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and padded!
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I did not give this 5 stars is bc it makes the stream from the faucet about half the strength so it takes twice as long to fill the tub. But I love that it is not the hard plastic. I do see how others advised it could mold easily but it can be machine washed so that’s easy enough. I like that it is not the rock hard plastic that the elephant and whale we looked at in stores were. Lots of padding so my little won’t hurt her head if she hits it. Super easy install. Adjustable strap keeps it in place nicely. Overall I’m pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Stanovich

customer_reviews.title: Padded, easy to put on.
customer_reviews.text: This fit our faucet well. The kids liked it the first time they saw it, now they don't really acknowledge it. But I really like it, it's well padded so I'm not as nervous about them getting near the faucet. I've been scarred from my childhood, I was too close to the faucet and stood up and scratched my back- as a result I've always been nervous of kids being around faucets, this alleviates that concern for the most part. The only concern i have is it's always wet because it catches water from shower when it's first turned on/off making me wonder if it's going to smell mildewy eventually, tbd.
customer_reviews.author: Monicali

customer_reviews.title: Alright, could have been better
customer_reviews.text: It's a great , adjustable faucet cover. My only complaint is that the cushiony part doesnt extend around the bottom of the faucet. I know there need to be netting for water to run through but I wish the cushion went over the faucet rim be ause the child could get under their and on the way up could get a little ding from that. Nothing terrible but it could have been a bit better.
customer_reviews.author: CarGuy71

customer_reviews.title: slight modification to fit our spout, but works great!
customer_reviews.text: We initially went sans cover until our toddler somehow got a cut on his forehead bumping into the spout. However, as you pull down on the spout to activate the shower, it would be difficult to use some of the other covers on the market, and I didn't want to be pulling off the spout each time to use the shower. Came across this cover, which works great!. As another reviewer mentioned, there this a mesh over the opening which I had to cut in order to be able to still use the shower pull down, but that was trivial, and the fit is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: ffej101

customer_reviews.title: the best
customer_reviews.text: we originally purchased the blue hard whale from walmart and it did not even come close to fitting our standard tub spout so we bought this instead. i was worried about it being thin and not serving its purpose but this thing is thick, soft, and sturdy. it has never fallen off. I love that you can toss it in the wash and wash it. my daughter things this thing is so cool and we love it too!
customer_reviews.author: MKBTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Makes bath time more fun!!
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about my toddler grandson having to dodge a sharp edged faucet as he enjoyed his tubby time. I read reviews on solid plastic strap on covers, but didn’t want shifting or mold. This one is adorable-kids love faces! It also can be tossed into the wash and come out fresh whenever needed. Fits like a glove over the faucet and doesn’t shift during use. Water stream from the faucet simply moved unimpressed through the “belly” of the friendly fish!
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I do love this tub spout cover. It is very well padded so if you're a little one does knock their head on the tub spout it will not hurt them. The only issue that I have is that we have an older faucet so it does not fit our faucet terribly well. I do love the fact that all you have to do to clean it is throw it in the wash and you don't have to worry about it getting moldy in odd spots
customer_reviews.author: Carrie P.

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cover! The only downside is one that I knew was going to be a problem. Our spout has a circle on the bottom of the spout(where the water comes out) that you pull down on to make the water transfer the shower head. I just take this off when I am done with the baby’s bath. If you don’t have this kind of spout or if you don’t intend to leave it on, it is a great cover!
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Slipped right off
customer_reviews.text: I must specify that we have a weird tub faucet. It's not the normal style that everyone seems to have, but I was hoping that this one would fit. It slipped right off and being that it is fabric it looks like a mildew special waiting to happen. Sending it back now.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: thick padding
customer_reviews.text: I really like that this isnt made of plastic like many other because I feel like that would completely defeat the purpose. However it slips off so easy. My toddler just takes it off each bath and i have to fight with him to leave it alone. I wish the strap to attach it was stronger or there was an inside piece made of plastic to keep it from coming off so easy.
customer_reviews.author: Megan and Andrew Sabatino

customer_reviews.title: Padded cushion, easy to clean, shower pull tab access
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t imagine ever wanting one of those hard plastic covers after knowing this exists! The padding is super thick, I am completely confident that my baby won’t hurt themself when in the tub. It’s super easy to clean, I throw it in the washer with some vinegar whenever I do the bathroom linens. Love that it has a slit for the shower pull tab on top. So happy I chose this cover!
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this does the job. It keeps my child safe from hitting her head on the water faucet in the tub. I do wish they made the water hole larger as the flow of the bath water is slowed. The water comes out fine, just not at the same rate it would if this wasn't installed. Installation was super easy. You simply slip it over the faucet!
customer_reviews.author: Amber M

customer_reviews.title: Head-saver for Sure
customer_reviews.text: As most of you with toddlers know keeping them "sitting down" is not always an easy task. The cover is easy to take on and off and the water runs through the bottom of it, which is also padded. Just this week it has saved my toddler twice from having a nasty bruise on her head from hitting the faucet. We got another one for the grandparent's house!!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a cover that was too small for my new tub faucet. It is well padded and easy to put on. There is a slit in the top for the shower knob so you don’t have to remove it to use the shower. It has a mesh cover over the faucet opening so it provides protection there too. It is cloth so it does soak up the water but it seems to dry out between uses.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Great for Bathtime!
customer_reviews.text: It slides right onto the tub faucet and stays in place with the Velcro strip. The small netting where the water comes out is a little tricky, as I sometimes have to adjust the cover to allow the water to flow out. It's still very cute and washes easily (I usually leave it hanging to dry after bath time but once a week, it gets tossed into the washing machine). The colors are vibrant and the padding ensures that the child won't accidentally hurt themselves if they bump into the faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Cute but got modly fast
customer_reviews.text: This is cute and works as intended. The only issue is it stays wet forever and it got an unpleasant smell and a few dark spots (looks like mold?). The good news is you can wash in the washing machine, which I did. It is a pain that I need to take it out of the bath every day to put it somewhere to dry in fear it gets more moldy, though.
customer_reviews.author: Prisca Lo Surdo

customer_reviews.title: Not much cushion on the bottom
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to install, has great soft padded cushion all around it, and you can wash it in the washing machine. However, there is no cushion around the mesh where the Faucet tip reaches. My son always goes underneath the faucet to pick up toys and tend to stand up hitting his head. It hurts. This picture is what I had to do to protect his head from getting injured in case he hits his head. I sewed the “O” on it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Spring

customer_reviews.title: Not for spouts without drain plug
customer_reviews.text: I have the kind of tub spout that doesn't have the drain plug knob thingy and my one year old was able to pull this off immediately, rendering this completely useless. I suppose if you had the knob thingy, it might stay on but I have my doubts. It's at least cute and very padded while being useless.
customer_reviews.author: zomg

customer_reviews.title: Great for faucets with diverters on the spout opening
customer_reviews.text: This spout cover is the only one we could find that fit onto our faucet. It's a relatively wide faucet and the diverter is on the spout portion, not on the top. For our purposes, this thing works great, but we did need to cut off a bit of mesh to allow our diverter to pull through and it's almost too narrow for the faucet. Otherwise, it's cute, functional, and seems to dry just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Can throw in the washing machine!
customer_reviews.text: I went through two foam faucet covers and they both molded and I could not keep them clean. This one is easy to put on and take off with the velcro strap and throw in the washing machine. Cleaning problem solved. It is also easy to access the shower pull thingy too. Favorite cover so far. Hopefully, it will be the last.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear2

customer_reviews.title: The fish scared our child
customer_reviews.text: We ended up having to return this fish because while it was squishy enough to prevent our child from hitting her head on the faucet, she was scared to death of the fish! She isn't typically afraid of things, but something about the way the fish looks is apparently scary to some young children.
customer_reviews.author: MRB

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Functional
customer_reviews.text: We wanted something to cover the faucet during baby's bath time so he wouldn't hurt himself on it. I kept finding faucet covers that were cute and fun, but hard plastic. I couldn't see how those wouldn't be just as injurious for him. Then I found this and it's perfect. It goes on and off super easily, it's machine washable, water still flows out of it well, and it's super padded. If he bumps his head into it during his bath, it's no big deal. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Taryn

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommended
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product to protect your little ones from the bathroom Faucet. I couldn't tell you how many close calls my kids had to hitting there head and a washcloth wasn't thick enough to protect them. I 100% recommend this product. Bonus its machine washable so no mold!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: 12mth old easily pulls it off
customer_reviews.text: Maybe if my bath tub faucet had that little knob that you lift up & down on top, it’d be more secure. However, no matter how tight I velcro this on, my daughter can easily grab it and pull it off... however, if she’d leave it alone it’d work just fine. It’s spungy plush head definitely would protect my little one’s head... if only she’d leave it alone... good luck to you other parents!
customer_reviews.author: Caren

customer_reviews.title: Soft, quick drying, secure
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and fits perfectly over our bathtub spout. This is soft and prevents baby from hurting herself when she slides toward it while playing. It fits snugly without her being able to pull it off and has an opening to be able to use the shower head easily so we leave it on pretty much all the time. It’s breathable and dries quickly so it doesn’t grow mold. One of my favorite toddler must haves.
customer_reviews.author: Chris and Amanda MillerTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs down
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something to keep my daughter and son safe while in the bathtub and I came across this. I liked that it was soft and could easily throw it in the wash. What I don’t like is that it comes off with VERY little effort. My daughter tears it off as quickly as I put it on. Very disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Staci

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice product, it keep my toddler from banging her ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product, it keep my toddler from banging her head, but it doesn't stay on. My faucet gets bigger rim the back so it comes off very easily. I feel like it doesn't stay on even with the strap. I think if I need another I would not oder it again, I would just go with the rubber ones. The good thing is that it's machine washable.
customer_reviews.author: Karmen D

customer_reviews.title: No more head bumps!
customer_reviews.text: My oldest never had an interest in the bath spout but when 2.0 came along we knew we needed something to cover it! This product does a great job keeping our curious toddler safe during bath time. It’s easy to use and offers good protection. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: TLC

customer_reviews.title: Moldy
customer_reviews.text: It was great for a few weeks, but soon it started to grow black mold on it and it was so gross I just threw the whole thing away.
customer_reviews.author: SiSamohamm

customer_reviews.title: More padding than you think! Soft material!
customer_reviews.text: There’s more padding to this than looks like In the picture so I was pleasantly surprised! Very soft/squishy material and makes me feel a lot more comfortable with my baby in the bath! But, it didn’t fit well. That’s why I gave 4 stars. I have an older tub and this cap was longer than my faucet. It stays on due to the strap and for the price I don’t mind much that it doesn’t fit as well as I’d like. It gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Amie Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Top is cushioned but sides are not
customer_reviews.text: Its not as cushioned as I was hoping. The top of it is very cushioned but the sides are not. It also has a mesh lining for where the spout goes and it makes the water fly in all different directions. In general, im happy with it. I mainly needed something that would stop my boys from trying to chew on the tub spout and this does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan alfrey

customer_reviews.title: Buy this product
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this product! It has plenty of cushion in case your child were to fall on it. Water still flows out without any issues. It goes on easy and just as easily removable. I was concerned if it would wash well and it did. Very please with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't stay on our faucet
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how this thing is supposed to work on any faucet, to be honest. The velcro attacher does absolutely nothing to keep it on. My son pulled it off immediately. Useless for us. Cute if it worked!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Olson

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! I wanted something different than the whale that everyone sea to have. This little guy is cushiony, & water flows out perfectly. The only downside is there's no way to access the shower head pull without removing the fish.
customer_reviews.author: cnstewart1182

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to take on and off. I love that it is soft and not plastic. Cute design. My 2 and 1 year old do not ever try to take it off, I like that it is velcro so it is a bit adjustable to your faucet. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Truly happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: My 9 month old son is an early walker and very energetic. Can not keep him sitting in the tub and was afraid of real injury occurring. This fish is perfect. It is cushioned well, cute, and it slips right over the spout and secures pretty well. My son hasn’t been able to rip it off even after a lot of effort. It is easy for an adult to take off though so it can be tossed in the wash when needed. Just an overall great product.
customer_reviews.author: brittani

customer_reviews.title: Great item to keep little kids safe in the bathtub
customer_reviews.text: We have a square shower spout. I was concern our little toddler would hit her head on it or scratch herself on it. With this cover she hasn’t hurt herself on it at all. It did exactly what we expected. Great item to keep little kid safe in the bathtub.
customer_reviews.author: Phat L.

customer_reviews.title: Good, wish spout opening was bigger
customer_reviews.text: This product is super soft and does the job of protecting my kiddos heads from bumping the spot. I just wish that the spout mesh area that lets the water through was bigger. It covers up part of the spout and makes the water come out a little slower.
customer_reviews.author: Kenzie

customer_reviews.title: Check Your Faucet First
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and nice quality BUT you must have tub faucet that has pull knob for shower diverter built into the top of it. The little metal knob is what helps keep the faucet cover on. We have a separate pull knob, so this cover wouldn’t work for us.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits larger sized tub faucet
customer_reviews.text: I had some issues finding a cover to fit our larger sized tub faucet. Since this is made out of a cloth material its able to stretch over our faucet. It serves it's purpose in protecting our little ones from bumps and scrapes. After a few days they got used to it being on the faucet and haven't messed with it since. I've had no issues with mold, I do throw it in the wash it about every 2 weeks. It's easy to install and provides plenty of cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Lasaz23

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This is really perfect because it is fully washable so you don't have to worry about mold/mildew. It is soft and cushiony enough to protect as well as the big plastic ones but it is flexible and adjustable so it will fit over even odd-shaped faucets. Very cute and works well!
customer_reviews.author: EmzGemz

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: My little one was starting to get her head close to the tub spout so this is perfect to prevent any head injuries. This fits over my spout well without even having to be velcroed on. I take this on and off easily after each bath. Of course, my little one likes looking at it while getting her bath.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Very soft but comes off easily from my spout
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install..you just slip it over the spout and it velcros closed. However it doesn’t strap tight enough and slips right off. Also the hole isn’t big enough and the water doesn’t come out well with it on. I end up removing it while i run the water then put it back on. It is very soft but my baby pulls it off too easily for it to be effective.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Sacchetto

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for peace of mind in the “big bath”
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. When my little guy transitioned to the “big bath” he kept trying to stand up and I was afraid he would slip and hit his head. He hasn’t slipped, but this product gives me peace of mind in case he ever does. It’s a memory foam type material and super cushy! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: Great spout cover just wish it stayed on better.
customer_reviews.text: Love that it’s a soft spout cover but wish it would stay on better. It comes off very easily, my one year old loves to take it off in the middle of his bath and play. You clean it by putting in the wash which is awesome. The plastic one we had just kept getting black stains that wouldn’t come off no matter how much you scrubbed so this is a welcomed change.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Miles

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother! Won’t fit!!
customer_reviews.text: We couldn’t even use this thing once! I’d read the reviews about “great fit” versus it not staying on the spout at all.... well our spout did not hold the cover on for even a second. The item looks very nice, probably would’ve been easy to clean, too. Don’t waste the money, try something else!!! 👎🏻
customer_reviews.author: Jill P

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, looks nice, but....
customer_reviews.text: It does not create a complete cushioning for the faucet like we expected it to. It covers the entire faucet and looks very nice and holds firm. But a kid can still bang their head on the faucet trying to stand up in the tub. Its only a layer of cloth but there should be more padding underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Dwaipayan Mukherjee

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay on
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I wanted something soft and most that are in the stores are still really hard. Only problem is it doesn’t even stay on the spout! My little guy just pulls it straight off!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa H.

customer_reviews.title: A great product
customer_reviews.text: Best spout cover I've found. It is easy to clean, easy to take on and off, and my boys love it. The plastic covers hold mold and mildew..and this one I can just throw in the washer when it needs a good cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa Vieth

customer_reviews.title: Cute and efficient
customer_reviews.text: After my son hit himself twice I wasted no time trying to find a spot cover, and this one I think is better than that hard plastic one. He’s bumped himself once with it on and its like nothing happened. Definitely mommy approved!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves it! I got it because she was only 10 months at the time and was already big enough for the bath tub. I got this just to be safe and she enjoys looking at it and touching it and i can leave it on all the time and still take a shower
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: This guy is super cute but is pulled off really easily. My kiddo likes to pull this off first thing in the top and play with it. Sadly, it defeats the purpose since it is pulled off too easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jaimbob

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! My son had scratched himself on the faucet and I decided I needed a cover. I first looked at those hard plastic types, but after reading some reviews, I found this. It is soft, durable, washable, easy to use and cute. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Gross
customer_reviews.text: Got super gross only after a month. Does not wash clean. Do not recommend at all. Had a plastic whale one that lasted 3 years. Wish I got that one instead
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: It does what it is suppose to do. My 15M can easily pull it off but I just put it back on. I just wanted something to cover the faucet while he played. It is super cute and it makes him smile....which make me smile so win win.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Dungan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect protection for our babys bath time
customer_reviews.text: Great. I like that it’s soft padded fabric and not a hard plastic. Easy to Velcro on and off. Only down side is it’s hard to use the shower head with this (to lift the knob from tub to shower head)
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: My baby pulls this right off, no matter how tight I get it. It might work better with a faucet that has the shower knob you pull up, but mine doesn't have that, so this just slides right off. This also molds easily. I noticed that after about a week.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S

customer_reviews.title: Finally found a cover that works!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a cover to fit my awkward bathtub faucet! It’s super soft and easy to put on and take off. We washed it several times and has held up nicely. Would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: gary simoneau

customer_reviews.title: Fits easily.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many different spout covers, and none either fit or held up. This fits easily and I like how secure it is. It has already saved us from head bangs, and the kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Staci Galey

customer_reviews.title: Better Than the Foam Whale
customer_reviews.text: I wanted anything but the foam whale for this kiddo, and this one is great. Soft to protect from bumps, easy to put on, and machine washable. Checks all the boxes and my son loves his fishy!
customer_reviews.author: AMane

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Big and colorful and the foam padding is a safety feature. It gets very soppy wet when the tub fills and never really drys so it's a pain to remove and clean. It's not set and forget but it's thick neoprene like a life jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Na

customer_reviews.title: Replaced whale cover...
customer_reviews.text: I replaced the whale spout cover with this new cover. The problem with the whale cover is that it moves easily and it does not cover the sharp edges of the spout. This covers the entire spout and is washable.
customer_reviews.author: Re View

customer_reviews.title: It actually STAYS on.
customer_reviews.text: I love that this actually STAYS on the faucet. I’ve tried two others from other brands and they constantly fell off. The only thing I’m concerned about is that it never really dries out being a squishy material and all. Worried about mold.
customer_reviews.author: M Spivey

customer_reviews.title: This will not dry out fast enough.
customer_reviews.text: Its soft squishy and takes much too long to dry out! I can see it will develop mold if we keep using it! It is soft and protects the baby from hitting his head.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. My 2 year old has figured out how to take it off, but he also know how to put it back on so that's great too. I can just throw it is the wash when I need to. It's super cushioned and fits our old tub spout well
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Jordan Bonelli

customer_reviews.title: Safe and easy and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for keeping baby safe in bath. This is the second one we purchased because the first kind of wouldn’t stay on the spout. No problems with this one! Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: Quite disappointed. We have a basic water spout & this does not fit. It slips off, no matter how tight I make the strap. I do love how it looks, I love that it’s padded. Just stinks that it doesn’t fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amber G.

customer_reviews.title: wish there was a little more padding underneath it but ...
customer_reviews.text: wish there was a little more padding underneath it but its definitely cushier than the plastic ones we've used. Haven't washed it yet but hoping it survives the washing machine. if so, I'll be thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Ammers

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not secure
customer_reviews.text: This is colorful and soft. I love the idea of what it does BUT once my 1 year old figured out how to *very easily* pull this off the spout, it became ineffective.
customer_reviews.author: MoonshineRunner

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly! I do have a long spout so this covered most of it. I also have the lever on the tip/top of spout and this fit over it perfectly only 4 starts because there is mesh under the spout part so the water doesnt flow as fast but I really love this. Will buy it for my sisters baby shower
customer_reviews.author: MMB  .4r e e  e.2 MMBmmm7o

customer_reviews.title: Best spout cover
customer_reviews.text: Previously had the more hard cover popular spout and it got mold really bad and just wouldn’t stay on with a toddler tugging at it. This one stays on with the kids pulling at it and I like that I can throw it in the wash.
customer_reviews.author: CreativeCarpets

customer_reviews.title: hummm... no
customer_reviews.text: Keeps sliding off it drives me nuts. It's like stuffed fabric so make sure u let it dry really well after every bath/shower. I should have read the description so yeah... it's my fault. No good!!
customer_reviews.author: Valpii

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for us.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I thought it would be nice to have a soft spout cover at bath time. I should have just gotten the hard one. I find this to be a pain to put on and off and align. It’s soft so it actually ends up having water spots/stains on it. We don’t use this anymore.
customer_reviews.author: DeeTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Very cushiony
customer_reviews.text: I love it. My son just started standing up in the tub and it alleviates some anxiety I have of him falling and hitting his head on the spout.

customer_reviews.title: Falls right off
customer_reviews.text: Falls right off the faucet. Got moldy within 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: TODDLER LOVES IT
customer_reviews.text: Prevents my son from switching the shower off, while also keeping him safe. Very padded, fits great (other designs/products didn't fit our faucet so they were returned). A must for baby bath time.
customer_reviews.author: ShabbyDaisy

customer_reviews.title: 20-month-old loves it
customer_reviews.text: have one in each of two bathtubs. For some reason my grandson was/is freaked out my reflection in spout so this blocks that and if fun.
customer_reviews.author: rustyredcab

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This looks like it would help with safety in the bath but my son just pulls it right off. We actually threw it away shortly after we got it because it got in the way and it stayed saturated with water all of the time which was gross.
customer_reviews.author: David Stout

customer_reviews.title: mostly good
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely sturdy and thick, except for the mesh underneath, where the water falls through. It ripped when I was putting it on the faucet.
customer_reviews.author: fabian rivera

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: We love this product! It keeps my baby from bumping his head and is adorable. It’s easy to pull off and throw in the washer, then slip back on.
customer_reviews.author: EKN

customer_reviews.title: Maybe skip this one.
customer_reviews.text: To easy for my 11 month old to remove on her own. Will work for now. May work better for faucets with the shower lever on top.
customer_reviews.author: Bo J.

customer_reviews.title: Padded and soft.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. It fits a standard tub faucet and is padded and soft. Not hard plastic like my older kids had when they were little. My son can goof off and I don’t have to worry about him whacking his head or back on the faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelb

customer_reviews.title: Slips off spout and cannot tighten enough
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I have a 1 and a 2 year old that love the bath spout and are constantly wanting to drink out of the metal spout. I like that it is squishy, and soft. But they think it's cute too, so they are constantly pulling it off. Nothing I do stops them from pulling it off. You cant tighten it enough and it slips right off. While it is cute and soft, I have to sit in a chair next to the tub with my hand around it, or rest my foot on the fish so they cant take it off.
customer_reviews.author: Geri

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the purchase l.
customer_reviews.text: Does the job! My kids used to knock their poor heads on the faucet and now this really pads the faucet to avoid bumps. Seals tightly on the faucet so it doesn’t come off easily when tugged on
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I like that this is soft and would protected the baby from bonking her head off the faucet But, it just does not stay on. So it's pointless.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Best Spout Cover
customer_reviews.text: We have a large spout in our bathroom so this was the only cover I could find to fit. It's easy to install and easy to use the shower valve with it. The only issue is that our first one did mildew and even though we washed it a couple times, after a year we had to replace it. But for the price it's the best option even if we buy one every year.
customer_reviews.author: CentralBecky

customer_reviews.title: Super soft, but slips off easily
customer_reviews.text: I love how soft the top of this spout cover is. It has a nice cushion just in case my little one accidentally bumps his noggin. But he likes to pull the cover off the spout. It’s super easy for him to do so. I wish the strap had some rubber grippers or some mechanism to keep the cover from slipping off so easily. I like this cover much much more than the hard plastic ones, even if it comes off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

product_meta.title: Infantino Cap The Tap Bath Spout Cover
product_meta.description: The Cap the Tap Spout Cover is made from super soft neoprene to cushion hard faucet edges. Easy fastening strap adjust for a snug, secure fit on the faucet. Neoprene is naturally quick drying and machine washable.
feature_bullets: Prevents bumps and bruises with a soft, cushioned bath spout cover made from neoprene, not hard plastic.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,171 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
